title: 无法访问Curseforge
author: xjq2009
txt_content:
具体是这样的：
我原来装了一个Adblock Plus，但不知为什么，我加了白名单，hCaptcha也无法加载，删了插件也没用，错误原文：
There was an issue communicating with the captcha provider. This issue may be caused by an ad-blocker, please disable your ad-blocker and reload the page if that issue persists. More information may be available below.

求解决方案

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
1、试试手机开热点或者手机流量上

2、或者试试这个：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... =778175&ordertype=1

3、或者用这个
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 774928&pid=12617201
下载插件：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 774928&pid=12616793

4、还不行的话你要不要+Q远程操作？

replies.author: xjq2009
replies.txt_content:
爱心魔王FHC 发表于 2020-8-17 20:14
尝试更换浏览器
…………没用

replies.author: renyunzhong
replies.txt_content: 提示: 该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: 声名我主宰
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-774928-1-1.html
试试这个？不行的话就对curseforge使用加速器吧

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content: 禁用adblock后刷新，因为adblock把验证当成广告屏蔽了

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content:
爱心魔王FHC 发表于 2020-8-17 20:14
尝试更换浏览器
不是浏览器的问题，是Adblock把recaptcha的验证屏蔽了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
诡异的滑稽 发表于 2020-8-18 09:15
不是浏览器的问题，是Adblock把recaptcha的验证屏蔽了
没有adblock一样也会说
There was an issue communicating with the captcha provider. This issue may be caused by an ad-blocker, please disable your ad-blocker and reload the page if that issue persists. More information may be available below.

replies.author: 诡灬稽
replies.txt_content:
爱心魔王FHC 发表于 2020-8-18 09:26
没有adblock一样也会说
There was an issue communicating with the captcha provider. This issue may b ...
就是我把Adblock在Curseforge禁用就没问题了，是不是只有我是这样的

replies.author: xjq2009
replies.txt_content:
爱心魔王FHC 发表于 2020-8-18 09:28
1、试试手机开热点或者手机流量上

2、或者试试这个：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... =778175&order ...
其实吧……我加了个Ghelper的插件，reCaptcha是加载的出来的，Adblock由于会屏蔽hCaptcha所以不能用

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
xjq2009 发表于 2020-8-18 18:02
其实吧……我加了个Ghelper的插件，reCaptcha是加载的出来的，Adblock由于会屏蔽hCaptcha所以不能用 ...
那就先把Adblock关掉咯

先全部关掉，就可以调出那个验证
最后验证成功再把插件打开

最后验证成功再把插件打开
